stories.text:
Hey HN, I made a code editor which is inspired by Xi-editor. It's native GUI and GPU rendered written in Rust. A main feature is remote development support (VSCode like). Also other features like Vim-like modal editing, Tree-sitter for syntax highlighting, built-in LSP support and WASI based plugin system.

Previous HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=29549173
stories.title: Show HN: Lapce â€“ open-source code editor inspired by Xi-editor
Import Maps Under the Hood in Rails 7

stories.text:
There are hundreds of thousands of Ukrainians fleeing Ukraine now. Here in the Czech Republic we are scrambling to find places for them to stay. Same thing in Poland, Slovakia, Romania, and so on.

Does anyone know anyone at Airbnb who would help? There are 15000 airbnb apartments in Prague alone.

Can the tech world please help?

There are already lots of websites in various regions where people can sign up to offer goods, drivers, accomodation, etc. Airbnb can COMPLETELY SOLVE the accomodation part - the locations, the volunteers, etc.

thank you.
stories.title: Ask HN: Can Airbnb Help housing Ukrainian escapees in central europe, please?
Cargo Ship Carrying Thousands of Luxury Cars Sinks in The Atlantic
